chapter.text: 83|1|Durbhoga tadera jan'ya yara mape kama deya [1]
83|2|yara lokadera kacha theke mepe neyara samaya purnamatraya grahana kare
83|3|ara yakhana taderake mepe deya athaba ojana kare deya, takhana kama deya.
83|4|Tara ki bisbasa kare na ye, tara punaruthita habe
83|5|mahadine
83|6|yedina damrabe samasta manusa srstikulera rabera samane [1]
83|7|kakhano na, papacaridera amalanama to sijjine [1] ache.
83|8|Ara kise apanake janabe ‘sijjina’ ki
83|9|cihnita amalanama [1].
83|10|Sedina durbhoga habe mithyaropakaridera
83|11|yara pratidana dibase mithyaropa kare
83|12|ara sudhu pratyeka papistha simalanghanakari'i ete mithyaropa kare
83|13|yakhana tara kache amadera ayatasamuha tela'oyata kara haya takhana se bale, (e to) ‘purbabartidera upakatha.’
83|14|Kakhano naya; baram tara ya arjana kareche ta-i tadera hrdaye jan dhariyeche [1].
83|15|Kakhano naya; niscaya sedina tara tadera raba hate antarita thakabe [1]
83|16|tarapara niscaya tara jahanname dagdha habe
83|17|tarapara bala habe, ‘eta'i ta yate tomara mithyaropa karate.’
83|18|Kakhano naya, niscaya punyabanadera amalanama ‘illiya'iyyine’ [1]
83|19|Ara kise apanake janabe ‘illiyyina’ ki
83|20|cihnita amalanama [1].
83|21|(Allahara) sannidhyapraptara'i ta abalokana kare [1].
83|22|Niscaya punyabanagana thakabe parama sbacchandye
83|23|susajjita asane base tara dekhate thakabe.
83|24|Apani tadera mukhamandale sbacchandyera dipti dekhate pabena
83|25|taderake mohara kara bisud'dha paniya hate pana karana habe
83|26|yara mohara habe misakera [1], ara e bisaye pratiyogira pratiyogita karuka [2].
83|27|Ara tara misrana habe tasnimera [1]
83|28|eta eka prasrabana, ya theke sannidhyapraptara pana kare.
83|29|Niscaya yara aparadha kareche tara muminaderake upahasa karata [1]
83|30|ara yakhana tara muminadera kacha diye yeta takhana tara cokha tipe bidrarupa karata.
83|31|Ara yakhana tadera apanajanera kache phire asata takhana tara phirata utphulla haye
83|32|ara yakhana muminaderake dekhata takhana balata, ‘niscaya era pathabhrasta [1].’
83|33|Athaca taderake muminadera tattbabadhayaka kare pathano hayani [1].
83|34|Ata'eba aja muminagana upahasa karabe kaphiraderake
83|35|susajjita asane base tara dekhate thakabe.
83|36|Kaphirara tadera krtakarmera phala pela to
